text: Larry Jones (born September 22, 1942) is an American former professional basketball player. He played six seasons in the American Basketball Association (ABA) for the Denver Rockets, The Floridians, Utah Stars, and Dallas Chaparrals. He also played two seasons with the Philadelphia 76ers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). On January 15, 1970, Jones became the first player in ABA history to record 5,000 points. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Basketball coaches Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:Sportspeople from Columbus, Ohio
title: Larry Jones
